summary:
Captain America, talking to Peter: you kids have your Snapchats and your tick tock's... 
Captain: the only "tick tock"  I have...
body:
Captain America, talking to Peter: you kids have your Snapchats and your tick tock’s…

Captain: the only “tick tock” I have is the one in my heart, and thats it’s beat…

Peter, who didn’t ask:

Captain: and it beats for America 🇺🇲

blog.name: nightskyblufaith
blog.title: "I love you 3000"
blog.description:
I know the characters are fictional but goddammit my emotions are real!
#irondad, spiderson and irondaughter

body:
Endgame headcanon

“I was fighting for Gamora” Nebula said.

“She wasnt my sister by blood but she was all I had”

“Who were you fighting for?”

She was met with silence as the mans breaths became even shallower. The man, Tony Stark, who had managed to make the great titan bleed, was slowly wasting away.

She walked over to the pilots seat and laid an hand on his shoulder. “Wake up Stark!” She growled.

She was not going to lose anyone else.

He came to with a gasp, sucking in precious oxygen with deep breaths. Nebula had managed to transfer the precious air from one of the space pods to one of the emergency space suits that Quill had stored away.

“I ask again Stark, who are you fighting for?”

The man clenched his jaw in determination as he forced himself to inhale small amounts of his precious life source.

“He wasn’t mine by blood ” he gasped

“But I am going to give everything I have to get him back!”

Tony smirked as he stood up from the pilots seat.

“Its time to get back into hardware mode”

blog.name: yetanothercomicbook
blog.title: Comics
blog.description: Most of the comics I read are Marvels from 1984. Every time I read a comic, I post a comment. That's pretty much it.

title: The Empty Shell
body:
Iron Man #167

Middle-of-the-road action issue. With a twist ending.

  • The villains are duplicates of ones seen in recent issues. An interesting idea that works well enough.
  • The reveal at the end has been coming for a few issues and was easy to predict. A character was shoehorned into the series and this was the only place their arc could go. It feels like a contrived way to get Tony drinking.
  • Denny O'Neil (9 of 49).
  • Luke McDonnell (6 of 37). 

6/10

blog.name: yetanothercomicbook
blog.title: Comics
blog.description: Most of the comics I read are Marvels from 1984. Every time I read a comic, I post a comment. That's pretty much it.

title: One of Those Days...
body:
Iron Man #166

Best chapter of the storyline so far.

  • It starts off with Tony simply having a bad day. Various minor things annoying him, chipping away at him.
  • By the second half, Iron Man is in action, battling robot tanks and closing in on the villain who’s been behind the scenes in recent stories.
  • Refreshingly, when they come face-to-face Tony finds there is really nothing much he can do. Since he can’t prove anything.
  • More bad news, and a strong cliffhanger ends the issue.
  • Denny O'Neil (8 of 49).
  • Luke McDonnell (5 of 37). 

8/10

blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Denial
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2HVsfPL

by TenSpencerRiedPlease

“I’ll cut to the chase. What’s the deal with Rhodey?” Sam asks, realizing too late that that’s not very descriptive as far as Tony is concerned.

Tony must know what he means anyway though because he sets down his equipment, turning a few things off before sighing. Not a good sign. “Alright- so here’s the deal. Rhodey has no idea he’s an entire ass bisexual and no, sleeping with men did not clue him in. I love him, but he’s dumber than a sack of hammers with no heads when it comes to this stuff. I think he thinks that because he normally has a preference for women that somehow cancels out his attraction to men? I don’t know, but if you can manage to convince him he’s not straight I would be eternally grateful because his freaking out over you is getting old.”

Words: 2570, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Iron Man (Movies), Captain America (Movies)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Tony Stark, Sam Wilson (Marvel), Peter Parker, Flash Thompson
  • Relationships: James “Rhodey” Rhodes/Sam Wilson, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark Friendship, Rhodey is Doing His Best, but he’s also in denial, Sam Wilson is a Gift, Awesome Sam Wilson, Everyone here is bisexual, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, minor Peter Parker/ Flash Thompson, Humor, like a lot of it lol, Crack Treated Seriously


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2HVsfPL

by TenSpencerRiedPlease

“I’ll cut to the chase. What’s the deal with Rhodey?” Sam asks, realizing too late that that’s not very descriptive as far as Tony is concerned.

Tony must know what he means anyway though because he sets down his equipment, turning a few things off before sighing. Not a good sign. “Alright- so here’s the deal. Rhodey has no idea he’s an entire ass bisexual and no, sleeping with men did not clue him in. I love him, but he’s dumber than a sack of hammers with no heads when it comes to this stuff. I think he thinks that because he normally has a preference for women that somehow cancels out his attraction to men? I don’t know, but if you can manage to convince him he’s not straight I would be eternally grateful because his freaking out over you is getting old.”

blog.name: starker-obsession
blog.title: starker-obsession
blog.description: This is a side-blog which feeds my intense Starker obsession. Hannah/25/England/ my main is: asiriuscrushonmoony

title: Lost Moments (Starker)
body:
With Tony and Peter, it wasn’t meant to be.  They both knew that, and they’d known that a long time but they still couldn’t admit that to themselves or to each other.  It had been a long time coming - lingering touches, longing gazes, constant flirting that was so subtle but yet so not subtle at the same time.  They didn’t have to say the words to one another to know that somewhere along the line, they’d fallen madly and deeply in love.  But it wouldn’t work, and they knew that, so neither of them acted on their feelings.

They were in the middle of a mission.  Things were tense.  They’d been backed into a corner, stuck hiding between two large panels of metal.  There wasn’t a lot of room, and they found themselves pressed right up against each other.  To say there was a buzz of sexual energy flowing between them would be an understatement.  It was dark, but they could see each other perfectly.  Tony was staring down at Peter.  The look in his eyes could be interpreted as ‘I want you’, and Peter read it like Tony had said it aloud.  Peter stared right back, biting down softly on his lip and slowly releasing it, silently telling Tony ‘then have me’, and Tony understood.

Their lips were only inches apart.  All they had to do was close the gap.  Peter pressed himself closer to Tony, and Tony leaned his head down to capture the boy’s lips in a long-anticipated kiss.  This would be it, the moment they’d both been thinking about every second of every day…

A loud creak, and the door to the room they were hiding in was open.  Light streamed in and they became alert to their surroundings.  A voice echoed through the room.

“We’re done.  We can go back now,” came a familiar voice, belonging to Steve Rogers.  And that was it, their one chance missed.  Tony shuffled out from behind the metal panels, closely followed by Peter.  They didn’t utter a word to one another as they left the room and their lost moment behind, never to be spoken of again.
